    Utility class providing access to Anvil's 10 default funded test accounts.

    Represents block identifiers for Ethereum JSON-RPC calls.
    BlockTag.Named
    Named block tag (e.g., "latest", "pending", "earliest").

    Block number tag.
    Brane
    Unified entry point for interacting with Ethereum/EVM blockchains.
    Brane.Builder
    Builder for creating Brane client instances.
    Brane.Reader
    Read-only client for blockchain queries.
    Brane.Signer
    Full-featured client with transaction signing capability.
    Brane.Tester
    Testing interface for interacting with test nodes (Anvil, Hardhat, Ganache).
    BraneExecutors
    Factory methods for creating executors optimized for different workloads.
    BraneMetrics
    Interface for collecting metrics from the Brane RPC layer.
    BraneMetrics.Noop
    Private no-op implementation of BraneMetrics.
    BraneProvider
    Low-level abstraction for sending JSON-RPC requests to an Ethereum node.
    CallRequest
    Type-safe representation of an eth_call request.
    CallRequest.Builder
    Builder for creating CallRequest instances.
    CallResult
    Represents the result of a single call in a transaction simulation.
    CallResult.Failure
    Represents a failed call result (revert or execution error).
    CallResult.Success
    Represents a successful call result.
    HttpBraneProvider
     
    HttpBraneProvider.Builder
     
    ImpersonationSession
    Represents an active impersonation session for a specific address on a test node.
    JsonRpcError
    JSON-RPC error object as defined in the JSON-RPC 2.0 specification.
    JsonRpcNotification
    Represents a JSON-RPC notification (a request without an ID).
    JsonRpcRequest
    Represents a JSON-RPC 2.0 request to an Ethereum node.
    JsonRpcResponse
    Represents a JSON-RPC 2.0 response from an Ethereum node.
    LogFilter
    Filter criteria for querying event logs via eth_getLogs.
    MulticallBatch
    Orchestrates a batch of Multicall3 requests.
    RpcConfig
    Configuration for HTTP-based RPC providers.
    RpcRetryConfig
    Configuration for RPC retry behavior with exponential backoff.
    RpcRetryConfig.Builder
    Builder for creating custom RpcRetryConfig instances.
    SimulateCall
    Represents a single call in a transaction simulation batch.
    SimulateCall.Builder
    Builder for SimulateCall.
    SimulateRequest
    Represents a request to simulate a batch of calls using eth_simulateV1.
    SimulateRequest.Builder
    Builder for SimulateRequest.
    SimulateResult
    Represents the result of a transaction simulation batch.
    SnapshotId
    Represents a snapshot ID returned by test node snapshot methods.
    Subscription
    Represents an active subscription to a real-time event stream.
    TestNodeMode
    Represents different test node implementations and their RPC method prefixes.
    WebSocketConfig
    Configuration for WebSocketProvider.
    WebSocketConfig.Builder
    Builder for WebSocketConfig.
    WebSocketConfig.WaitStrategyType
    Disruptor wait strategy types.
    WebSocketProvider
    Ultra-low latency WebSocket provider using Netty and LMAX Disruptor.
    WebSocketProvider.ConnectionState
    Connection state for explicit state machine management.
    WebSocketProvider.RequestEvent
    Event class for LMAX Disruptor - instances are pre-allocated and reused.
